entry.title: <DC Oneshots>
entry.summary:
Author: AttractiveUrchin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,549Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 54

Summary: A collection of DC X readers, Ranging from Superboy to Red Hood, all characters that have been written for or will be are tagged below. If a character is younger, there will be no sexual elements to that individual story, unless aged up. All of these are one-shots and will be updated frequently. Check out my MARVEL or Animation books :)Requests allowed!(Scroll a bit for rules)1) I can deny any request (Obviously), usually this is because I don't know a character/media well enough to write for it.2) After completing a request, I'll likely delete the original comment and replace it with one of my own- request, title, requester, ex.3) I typically only do ONE request per person!4) All requests are done in my free time, they do not take priority over current chapters!

entry.title: Kinktober 2025
entry.summary:
Author: Sleeping_In_Stardust

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,001Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 4

Summary: Welcome to my Kinktober 2025 masterlist! Please make sure to read all the tags thoroughly. I haven't done one of these before, so bear with me. This also isn't the 'official list' that's been going around (don't hate me, just wanted to do my own thing). 15 days of x Reader / Y/N kink across multiple fandoms. Prompts will be posted every other day (if things go as planned), escalating from soft and intimate to darker themes, with a Halloween finale. General CW, not intended for those under 18.

entry.title: Under Protection
entry.summary:
Author: Nightly_Darkk

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,297Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 19

Summary: The mission sounded simple at first: protect Gotham's most infamous vigilantes in their civilian skins. The reality? Nothing is simple in Wayne Manor. The secrets there cling like shadows to the wall and for all of Batman's insistence of strategy, it's starting to feel a lot more like scheming. The BatBoys are restless, sharp, always watching. Constantly bristling at the idea of being protected.And in the middle of it all is her. A girl so unaware of the storm coming closer to her door each day. She isn't supposed to be there. She isn't even supposed to matter. But she does- and no one can say why. The was told to protect them. Nobody said what they'd have to protect themselves from.

entry.title: Strangers in the Night
entry.summary:
Author: unnamedmystery

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,434Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 150

Summary: When the Daily Planet heard word of a new vigilante in Crime Alley that supposedly had no affiliation with Batman, Perry White thought it to be a nice short story—a quick in and out. After all, while the people of Metropolis had Superman, everyone knew of Batman, and a vigilante not working with him seemed interesting. At least, that’s what Perry told his college intern. And her mentor Clark Kent when he raised concerns. No one told her that the vigilante was intimidatingly attractive. Or that Crime Alley was the worse place in Gotham City. Or that her mentor would ask a friend to keep tabs on her. Or that the detective she’s staying with hates Batman despite working with him frequently. Or that the detectives neighbor was a really cute guy.
